auth.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

home.commercialBlock1Title: Search the best salons, clinics, & experiences in Japan
home.commercialBlock1Text: Discover thousands of verified businesses across 15+ categories. From luxury hotels to local izakaya, find exactly what you're looking for.
home.commercialBlock2Text: Our intelligent AI helps you find available times, answers questions, and handles bookings in multiple languages—24/7.
home.commercialBlock3Title: Save time, book instantly, discover top-rated shops
home.commercialBlock3Text: No more phone calls or waiting. Book your favorite services in seconds and access your booking history anytime.
home.customerCTADesc: Join thousands of customers who book faster with AI assistance
home.ownerCTADesc: Automate customer messages and grow your business effortlessly

categories.hotelsRyokanDesc: Luxury accommodations and traditional Japanese inns
categories.hotelsRyokanModalDesc: Experience the finest accommodations in Japan, from modern luxury hotels to traditional ryokan with hot springs and kaiseki dining.
categories.hotelsRyokanModalBenefits: Book premium stays with instant confirmation. Compare prices, read reviews, and secure your reservation in minutes.
categories.hotelsRyokanModalAI: Our AI assistant helps you find the perfect accommodation based on your preferences, dates, and budget. Available in 5 languages.
categories.restaurantsIzakayaDesc: Fine dining and casual Japanese pubs
categories.restaurantsIzakayaModalDesc: From Michelin-starred restaurants to cozy neighborhood izakaya, discover Japan's incredible culinary scene.
categories.restaurantsIzakayaModalBenefits: Reserve tables instantly, see real-time availability, and never miss out on your favorite spots.
categories.restaurantsIzakayaModalAI: AI helps you find restaurants by cuisine, location, and availability. Get instant booking confirmations.
categories.beautySalonModalDesc: Transform your look with Japan's top beauty professionals. Hair styling, makeup, and complete beauty treatments.
categories.beautySalonModalBenefits: Book appointments online, see stylist portfolios, and manage your beauty schedule effortlessly.
categories.beautySalonModalAI: AI assistant recommends the best salons based on your needs and preferred styles. Instant booking available.
categories.eyelashSalonModalDesc: Get stunning eyelash extensions from certified professionals. Natural, volume, or hybrid styles available.
categories.eyelashSalonModalBenefits: Book your lash appointment with detailed service descriptions and real-time availability.
categories.eyelashSalonModalAI: AI helps you choose the perfect lash style and find available appointments that fit your schedule.
categories.nailSalonDesc: Expert nail art and care services
categories.nailSalonModalDesc: Express yourself with beautiful nail art from Japan's most talented nail artists. Manicures, pedicures, and intricate designs.
categories.nailSalonModalBenefits: Browse nail art galleries, book appointments, and get reminders for your next visit.
categories.nailSalonModalAI: AI shows you trending designs and helps you book with artists who specialize in your preferred style.
categories.onsenDayuseDesc: Traditional hot springs and day-use bathing facilities
categories.onsenDayuseModalDesc: Relax in Japan's natural hot springs and traditional bathhouses. Experience authentic Japanese wellness culture.
categories.onsenDayuseModalBenefits: Check availability, see facilities, and book your relaxing day-use bath experience.
categories.onsenDayuseModalAI: AI helps you find onsen by location, type, and amenities. Get instant booking for day-use facilities.
categories.spaMassageDesc: Relaxing spa treatments and therapeutic massage
categories.spaMassageModalDesc: Rejuvenate your body and mind with professional spa treatments and therapeutic massages.
categories.spaMassageModalBenefits: Book massages and spa treatments with detailed service menus and therapist information.
categories.spaMassageModalAI: AI recommends treatments based on your needs and helps you find the perfect time for relaxation.
categories.golfCoursesDesc: Premium golf courses and practice ranges
categories.golfCoursesModalDesc: Tee off at Japan's finest golf courses. Book tee times, practice ranges, and golf lessons.
categories.golfCoursesModalBenefits: Check course availability, see rates, and secure your tee time instantly.
categories.golfCoursesModalAI: AI helps you find courses by location and difficulty level. Book tee times that fit your schedule.

home.title: Yoyaku Yo
home.subtitle: AI-powered booking assistant for salons in Tokyo
home.feature2: AI assistant handles messages, reschedules and cancellations
home.forCustomersDesc: Find salons by category, browse services, and book online 24/7.
home.forOwnersDesc: Connect your shop, manage bookings, and let AI handle customer messages.
home.aiAssistanceDesc: Handles customer messages in Japanese or English, manages reschedules and cancellations.
home.searchPlaceholder: Search by shop, category, or area
home.forOwnersBullet3: Operate efficiently with a simple dashboard
home.aiAssistanceBullet1: Automatically respond to customer messages in Japanese/English
home.heroSubtitle: Find beauty salons, hotels, clinics, and more across Japan.
home.categoryPageSubtitle: Select a category to find shops in Japan.
home.featuredPageSubtitle: Hand-picked shops recommended by Yoyaku Yo.
home.trendingPageSubtitle: Most popular shops this week, month, and all-time.
home.featuredCardText: Our most recommended and highly-rated partners.
home.feature1Text: Browse verified salons, clinics, hotels, and more in every major region.
home.feature2Text: Ask in your language and let AI find times, suggest shops, and handle bookings.
home.feature3Text: No phone calls or long forms—book in a few messages and track everything online.

booking.title: Book an appointment
booking.confirmedMessage: Your appointment is confirmed. Your personal ID is {customerId}. You can change or cancel anytime right here in this chat — just say hello again! ✨
booking.ownerWillConfirm: The shop owner will confirm your appointment.
booking.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking
booking.failedToCreate: Failed to create booking. Please try again.
booking.guestBookingDesc: No account required. Fill in your details to make a booking.
booking.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
booking.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
booking.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.
booking.bookingNotFoundDesc: The booking you are looking for could not be found.
booking.wantToManageBookings: Want to manage all your bookings in one place?

chat.title: Chat with AI assistant
chat.startConversation: Start a conversation with the AI assistant
chat.cannotRespond: Sorry, I cannot respond at the moment. Please try again later.

browse.searchPlaceholder: Search by city name or shop name...

shops.search: Search by shop name, area or service
shops.searchPlaceholder: Search by shop name, area or service
shops.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or category filter
shops.notAvailable: No shops are available at the moment
shops.shopDoesNotExist: The shop you are looking for does not exist.
shops.photosWillAppear: Photos will appear here once added by the shop owner.

myShop.title: My Shop
myShop.noShop: You don't have a shop yet.
myShop.startFresh: Start fresh with a new shop listing.
myShop.claimOwnership: Claim ownership of an existing shop.
myShop.selectUnclaimedShop: Select an unclaimed shop to claim ownership.
myShop.addFirstStaff: Add your first staff member above.
myShop.bookingsWillAppear: Bookings will appear here when customers make reservations.
myShop.areYouSureConfirm: Are you sure you want to confirm this booking
myShop.areYouSureReject: Are you sure you want to reject this booking
myShop.noGalleryPhotos: No gallery photos yet. Upload your first photo!
myShop.dateMarkedAsClosed: This date is marked as closed

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.subtitle: Manage customer conversations and get AI help
assistant.selectConversationDesc: Choose a thread from the left to view messages
assistant.capabilitiesDescription: Your AI Assistant is available throughout the dashboard via the chat bubble in the bottom-right corner. It can help you manage your shop efficiently with the following capabilities:
assistant.capabilityManageBookings: Manage bookings - View, confirm, reject, or cancel customer bookings
assistant.capabilityModifySchedule: Modify schedule - Update your shop's calendar and availability
assistant.capabilityUpdateShopHours: Update shop hours - Change opening and closing times
assistant.capabilityAnswerMessages: Answer customer messages - Respond to customer inquiries automatically
assistant.capabilityAutomatedResponses: Create automated responses - Set up automatic replies for common questions
assistant.capabilityAnalyzePerformance: Analyze shop performance - Get insights on bookings, revenue, and trends
assistant.capabilityRemindBookings: Remind the owner about upcoming bookings - Get notifications for pending bookings
assistant.capabilityEditServices: Edit services and prices - Update your service offerings and pricing
assistant.capabilityAddStaff: Add new staff - Manage your team members and their schedules
assistant.capabilityMarkHolidays: Mark holidays and closed dates - Set days when your shop is closed
assistant.capabilityCheckAvailability: Check availability - View real-time booking availability
assistant.capabilitiesCTA: Click the AI Assistant chat bubble in the bottom-right corner to get started!

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.addFirstReview: Be the first to review this shop

settings.title: Settings
settings.manageNotifications: Manage how you receive notifications about bookings and messages.

line.connectLineToGenerate: Connect LINE to generate QR code

landing.feature1Desc: Track your bookings and discover the best services with our intelligent analytics system.
landing.feature2Desc: Access Yoyaku Yo from any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile. Book anywhere, anytime.
landing.feature3Desc: Get instant help with our AI-powered chat support available in multiple languages 24/7.
landing.feature4Desc: All shops are verified and reviewed. Book with confidence knowing you're getting quality service.
